user_query: I want to organize a picnic for my family in a nearby park. Can you suggest some healthy and easy-to-prepare recipes for the picnic? Also, calculate the carbon footprint of our transportation to the park and provide the air quality health index for the park location.

TaskList.description: Research and suggest healthy, easy-to-prepare picnic recipes.
Calculate the carbon footprint based on the distance to the park and the mode of transportation used.
Fetch the air quality health index for the specified park location.
